about_the_game:
As part of the RoguekiniZ team you will make runs into Dolan island to learn its areas and eliminate the Zs. As you level up you will get better weapons, gear, traps, and skills. And when you’re ready, make a final run into the mountain base where it all began. Kill Dr Dolan and put an end to the zombie plague.

Key Features

Every Run Counts

Earn xp, level up, and get sweet loot to help you on your next run. You’ll need it because each run consists of multiple stages with challenging, varied mission types like defense, survival, elimination and more.

Weapons

Use guns, traps, and skills to defeat the zombie hordes. Guns are great but you’ll need to use traps and skills like “Air Strike” to make it through a run.

Gear

Change your character's outfits with looted gear which also provide stat bonuses. Look good, kill good.

Classes

Three character classes with specific bonuses to fit multiple play styles. The Soldier specializes in using guns. The Nurse has the best survivability. The Technician gets the most out of traps.

Enemies

Fight multiple zombie classes from simple shufflers and sprinters to more exotic types that will challenge you in surprising ways.

Flexible Challenge

The game is meant to test your skills but we have difficulty settings to appeal to players of all levels.

Dancing

Yes. You Can Dance

highlighted.name: Complete a run on any difficulty.
Complete a final run on any difficulty
Complete a run on hard difficulty
Complete a final run on hard difficulty
Complete a run with the Soldier class
Complete a run with the Nurse class
Complete a run with the Tech class

content_descriptors.notes:
Blood splatter and dismemberment of Zombies. 
Female characters in revealing bikini's. Suggestive dancing. Nudity.

And when you’re ready, make a final run into the mountain base where it all began. Kill Dr Dolan and put an end to the zombie plague.

name: RoguekiniZ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A rogue-like looter-shooter, with bikinis and zombies, and zombies in bikinis. Level up, loot up, look good, kill good.
